productDetails.shortDescription: Turn your favorite YouTube videos, articles, and blogs into systematic vocabulary learning. Click to save as flashcard.
productDetails.detailedDescription:
Build vocabulary from content you love.

Captur helps ESL students and professionals build vocabulary naturally‚Äîturn your favorite YouTube videos, articles, and blogs into systematic vocabulary learning with zero manual effort.

**How It Works:**

1. **Hover-to-Translate - Zero-Click Vocabulary Lookup**
   - Select any word or phrase on any webpage
   - Small teal dot appears at the end of selection
   - Hover over dot ‚Üí instant inline translation with styled button
   - Example: "opportunities" becomes **opportunities** _(Êú∫‰ºö)_
   - 30x faster than traditional dictionary lookup (0.5s vs 15-20s)
   - Zero clicks, zero context switching

2. **One-Click Flashcard Save**
   - Click any vocabulary button (yellow highlight + translation)
   - Button turns green with ‚úì checkmark ‚Üí word saved to flashcards
   - Takes 0.5 seconds (600x faster than manual card creation)
   - Green checkmark prevents duplicate saves
   - All flashcards sync to captur.academy with spaced repetition

3. **YouTube Transcript with Auto-Generated Vocabulary**
   - Click "üìù Key Takeaways" on any YouTube video
   - Side-by-side view: video + scrolling transcript
   - AI auto-detects 10-15 difficult words, highlights them in transcript
   - Click any highlighted word to save as flashcard
   - Transcript auto-scrolls with video playback

4. **Auto Vocabulary Extraction from Articles**
   - Click "üìù Key Takeaways" while reading any article
   - AI identifies 10-15 challenging words based on proficiency level
   - Words highlighted inline as clickable vocabulary buttons
   - Each button shows: English word + Chinese translation
   - Click to save as flashcard with source URL

5. **AI Writing Assistant**
   - Select text and press Shift twice for instant actions
   - Voice (rephrase), simplify, or generate replies
   - Replace text directly in editable fields
   - Perfect for email writing and professional communication

**Perfect For:**

- ESL students preparing for exams (TOEFL, IELTS, GRE) who consume English content daily
- International professionals who want to expand vocabulary while reading industry content
- Language learners building fluency through content they enjoy (YouTube, articles, blogs)
- Anyone who wants to learn English naturally through favorite creators and topics

**Key Features:**

‚úì Hover-to-translate: 30x faster than traditional dictionary (0.5s vs 15-20s)
‚úì One-click flashcard save: 600x faster than manual card creation
‚úì Auto vocabulary extraction with Chinese translations
‚úì YouTube transcript with synchronized vocabulary highlights
‚úì AI-powered key takeaways generation from any content
‚úì Double-Shift quick actions: rephrase, translate, simplify, reply
‚úì Visual vocabulary buttons with yellow highlights
‚úì Green checkmark feedback prevents duplicate saves
‚úì Spaced repetition review system
‚úì Works on YouTube, articles, blogs, social media
‚úì Secure sync with web app at captur.academy
‚úì Privacy-focused‚Äîonly saves what you select

**Why Captur is Different:**

Stop wasting time on boring language apps with generic word lists. Learn vocabulary from your favorite YouTubers, tech blogs, hobby content, topics you're passionate about‚Äîcontent you actually enjoy.

Traditional flashcard apps (Anki, Quizlet) require 3-5 minutes of manual card creation per word. Language apps (Duolingo, Babbel) force you through generic lessons instead of letting you learn from content you love.

Captur captures vocabulary while you consume content you're already watching and reading. Hover to translate in 0.5 seconds. Click to save. Words appear inline with yellow highlights and translations. Green checkmarks show what's saved.

**Not Just Professional Content:**

Learn English from ANY content you love:
- Favorite YouTube creators and channels
- Tech articles and programming blogs
- Business news and industry publications
- Hobby blogs (travel, cooking, sports, gaming)
- Entertainment content and social media
- Topics you're passionate about

Vocabulary matches YOUR interests, not generic textbook lists.

Start building vocabulary from content you love. Try it free.

**Privacy & Data Protection:**
- **Zero Tracking**: No browsing history, no personal information collection
- **Explicit Consent Only**: Data collected only when you click "Save" or "Key Takeaways"
- **What We Collect**: Selected text, page content (Key Takeaways only), page URL, timestamp
- **What We DON'T Collect**: Browsing history, keystrokes, passwords, cookies, personal data
- **AI Features**: Text sent to OpenAI only when you use Key Takeaways/rephrase buttons
- **OpenAI Policy**: Data not stored for training (per API usage terms)
- **Your Control**: Delete vocabulary anytime at captur.academy, uninstall extension anytime
- **Secure**: HTTPS encryption for all data transmission
- **Transparent**: UI clearly indicates when data will be collected
- Full privacy policy at captur.academy/privacy

**Support:**
Visit captur.academy or email support@captur.academy

storage.justification: Store user preferences and extension settings locally to maintain user configuration across browser sessions.

activeTab.justification: Access the current tab's content only when user explicitly saves selected text, generates takeaways, or uses AI writing features. Required to capture user-selected text and page content.

contextMenus.justification: Add "Save with Captur" option to right-click context menu for quick access to save functionality.

notifications.justification: Show success/error notifications when saving vocabulary to provide immediate user feedback.

scripting.justification: Required to inject the floating widget, AI writing assistant tooltip, and key takeaways interface into web pages. Only executes when user interacts with extension features.

https://www.captur.academy/*.justification: Required to send saved vocabulary notes to the user's Captur account via secure API. All data transmission uses HTTPS and only occurs when user explicitly saves selected text.

contentScripts.justification: Content script runs on all websites to enable the floating widget, AI writing assistant tooltip, and text selection capture. Script only activates when user explicitly selects text and presses double-shift or clicks the floating widget. No data is collected without explicit user action.

remoteCode.justification: This extension does NOT execute any remote code. All JavaScript is bundled within the extension package. Manifest V3 compliant.

authenticationInformation.notes: Extension connects to user's existing Captur account via website session

dataUsage.purpose: Vocabulary learning, language education, and AI-powered content assistance
dataUsage.prominentDisclosure: Users are clearly informed through the extension's UI about data collection: Context menu 'Save with Captur' (indicates text will be saved), Double-shift tooltip with AI buttons (indicates AI processing), 'üìù Key Takeaways' floating button (indicates page analysis), Vocabulary buttons with yellow highlights (show what can be saved), Green checkmarks (confirm successful saves), Hover tooltip on teal dot (shows translation). All data collection requires explicit user action. No passive monitoring or automatic data collection occurs.
dataUsage.thirdPartyDetails: Selected text and page content are sent to OpenAI API (via our secure backend) only when user explicitly requests AI features like rephrase, translate, or key takeaways generation. Data is used solely for generating AI responses and is not stored by OpenAI for training (per API usage terms).

certification.limitedUseCompliance: I certify that the use of information received from Google APIs will adhere to the Chrome Web Store User Data Policy, including the Limited Use requirements.
certification.accurateDisclosure: All data collection and usage has been accurately disclosed above and in the privacy policy.
certification.secureTransmission: All data is transmitted securely using HTTPS to https://www.captur.academy/
certification.minimumPermissions: Extension requests only the minimum permissions necessary for its single purpose.

testingInstructions.instructions:
**Basic Testing:**
1. Install the extension
2. Navigate to any webpage with text (e.g., linkedin.com, news article)
3. Verify floating "‚ú® Key Takeaways" widget appears in bottom-left corner

**Test Save Feature:**
4. Select any text on the page
5. Right-click and choose "Save with Captur"
6. Verify notification appears: "Captured!"

**Test Double-Shift Tooltip:**
7. Select text, press Shift twice quickly
8. Verify tooltip appears with buttons: Voice, Translate, Simplify, Reply, Save
9. Click any button to test AI features (requires backend API)

**Test Key Takeaways:**
10. Click the floating "‚ú® Key Takeaways" button
11. Verify AI-generated takeaways appear in a card
12. Click a takeaway to jump to relevant section

**Test Popup:**
13. Click extension icon in toolbar
14. Test "Generate Key Takeaways" button
15. Test "Save to Library" with custom text
16. Test URL save button (link icon)

**YouTube Test:**
17. Open any YouTube video
18. Click extension icon and save URL - verify transcript is fetched (if available)

**Google Docs Test:**
19. Open a Google Doc
20. Select text and use double-shift tooltip
21. Verify text replacement works in Google Docs

Note: Extension requires user to be logged in to captur.academy in the same browser for API authentication.
